short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically does Online Tests and assignments for you with multi platform support!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Latest Version adds support for Khan Academy and Schoology! *

Yo, Are you also lazy to do the online tests? With Test Hacker, you can breeze through your online tests like a pro. Whether it's ApexVS, Khan Academy  or other Schoology assessments, this extension has you covered. With Schoology Lockdown support , you'll be acing your courses without breaking a sweat. It auto answers and progresses in your tests guaranteeing you a 90% or above with the Premium Subscription. With the basic, it guarantees you a 70% or higher

Key Features:

1. Automated Test Solutions: Smash through online tests with lightning speed and spot-on accuracy. No sweat, no stress.

2. ApexVS Pro: Dominate ApexVS exams effortlessly, thanks to our expert optimization.

3. Schoology Lockdown Support: Get ready to breeze through Schoology Lockdown tests with our soon-to-be-released support.

4. User-Friendly Interface: Our sleek, intuitive interface fits right into your Chrome browser for a super smooth experience.

5. Secure and Private: Your data is safe with us. We protect your data like it's our own.

6. We have the cheapest pricing for this bot on the market! 

Steps to you:
Just install the extension and follow the steps!

Change Log:

V12.6.5
Full Redesign and Rebrand of Quiz Shark (Formally Quiz Hacker)

V 12.6.1
Added Support for Schoology Tests!!!

V 12.5.7
Fixed Issue with extension asking for extra permissions

V 12.5.6
Added Support for Khan Academy. Just go on their website click bot and axctivate. Then click on an assignment and it will do it for you!

V 12.5.2 
Added Support for Passive mode for Apex. It automatically goes through each test for you. Just click it on a unit once and it will complete the course within 2 - 3 hours.

V 12.5.0
Latest Stable release working for Apex VS

V 1.0.0
Initial Release
